channel.title: D claw help?

item.title: D claw help?
item.dc:creator: @coolman44445 coolman44445
item.description:
@coolman44445 wrote:

Hi guys,

I toughd that I’ve seen a tut before on how to make d claws hit 4 times. (preferably just like real rs? 1st hit == following 3 hits all together).
But I couldn’t find it so any help? Just post a link if there already is a tut or otherwise just help me pl0x

This is my d claw spec atm and it kinda sucks cuz I like the 4-hit. (Don’t worry ill change the spec damage :P)

ty[br][br][size=1]Posted on: June 14, 2009, 04:33:30 am[/size][hr]This is my code atm, only hits twice:

[code] public void DClawSpec() {
if (IsAttackingNPC && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 13664) {
setAnimation(2068);
actionTimer = 2;
SpecDamgNPC(600);
DDS2Damg = true;
DDStimer = 1;
resetAnimation();
teleportToX = absX;
teleportToY = absY;
SpecDamgNPC(600);
SpecialDelay -= 1;
} else if (IsAttacking && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 13664) {
int j = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absX;
int k = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absY;
int l = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].playerLevel[playerHitpoints];

        SpecDamg(600);
        DDS2Damg = true;
        DDStimer = 1;
        startAnimation(2068);
        actionTimer = 4;
        teleportToX = absX;
        teleportToY = absY;
        SpecialDelay -= 1;
    }
}[/code]
